duties_responsibilities.duty: Bring the lululemon guest experience framework to life, leading from the floor to establish an exceptional and inclusive guest experience.
Lead a team of associates to provide technical product education and exceptional customer service, ensuring every single guest's unique needs are met.
Assess and fulfill business, team, and guest needs while leading from the floor as the Supervisor on Duty (SOD).
Conduct preparation activities to ensure in-store readiness for guests and maintain operational excellence throughout shifts.
Review and interpret daily business data and metrics to track progress toward sales goals and motivate team to drive business results.
Participate in the store’s hiring process and support the ongoing learning and development of team members.
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team by establishing supportive working relationships and creating a fun and productive environment.
Address team member performance and provide direct feedback, recognition, coaching, demonstrations, and hands-on experiences to support their learning and development.
Open and close the store in accordance with the opening and closing procedures.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED/equivalent, or above. 1 year of retail or customer experience.
